articles.title: Mars Unmasked: Giant Volcano and Hidden Ice Challenge Old Theories - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A deeply eroded giant volcano, active from ancient through recent times and with possible remnants of glacier ice near its base, had been hiding near Mars’ equator in plain sight. Its discovery points to an exciting new place to search for life, and a potenti…
articles.content: Figure 1: A giant volcano hiding in plain sight in one of Mars’ most iconic regions.The newly discovered giant volcano on Mars is located just south of the planet’s equator, in Eastern Noctis Labyrin… [+13586 chars]
